INTERACTIONS.CONTEXT.DMS_ONLY: Interaction can only be ran in private messages.
INTERACTIONS.CONTEXT.GUILDS_ONLY: Interaction can only be ran in guilds.
INTERACTIONS.CONTEXT.REGISTERED_USERS_ON: Interaction requires you to be a registered user.
INTERACTIONS.CONTEXT.UNREGISTERED_USERS_: Interaction requires you to not be a registered user.
INTERACTIONS.PERMISSIONS.GLOBAL_ADMIN: Interaction requires you to be a global admin.
INTERACTIONS.PERMISSIONS.GUILD_ADMINS_ON: Interaction requires admin privilege in the current guild.
INTERACTIONS.ERRORS.GENERIC.RATELIMIT: You are ratelimited from using this command. Try again in `{left}`
INTERACTIONS.ERRORS.GENERIC.FAILURE: An error occurred trying to execute this interaction. This error has been reported and will be fixed soon.
INTERACTIONS.ERRORS.GENERIC.SHUTDOWN: This system is shutting down. You cannot execute any action at the moment.
SLASH_COMMAND.ERRORS.GENERIC.BACKUPS.BAC: No backup has been found with ID `{id}`
The passphrase provided does not match the stored hash.
SLASH_COMMAND.ERRORS.GENERIC.CANCELED_OP: This interaction has been canceled either by the user or by the system.
SLASH_COMMAND.ERRORS.GENERIC.COMMAND_BLO: It seems like you are already running an operation. You cannot run any other operations until you finished your current one.
SLASH_COMMAND.USER.DESCRIPTION: Manage your passphrase and personal data.
SLASH_COMMAND.USER.DELETE_USER.ARE_YOU_S: Are you really sure you want to delete all of your current data and exports. THIS ACTION IS UNRECOVERABLE.
SLASH_COMMAND.USER.DELETE_USER.SUCCESS: All of your data has been successfully deleted.
SLASH_COMMAND.USER.REGISTER.DESCRIPTION: Create a new account and encryption keys.
SLASH_COMMAND.USER.REGISTER.CHECK_DMS: Your registration has been successful. Please check your dms to find your passphrase.
SLASH_COMMAND.USER.REGISTER.HEADER_MESSA: Please read carefully the agreement above.
SLASH_COMMAND.USER.REGISTER.PASSPHRASE_R: Your passphrase is `{passphrase}`. Do not share or loose this key, as it unrecoverable and unchangeable
Note: Please pin this message for easier access in the future.
SLASH_COMMAND.USER.REGISTER.GENERATING_A: Please hold on as your account is being created...
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.DESCRIPTION: Create, delete or load certain backups.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.CREATE.ARGUMENTS.A: The amount of messages to store.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.CREATE.SUCCESS: Your backup has been successfully created. Please check your dms to find the ID of said backup.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.CREATE.ALERT: Please do not loose this identifier as it unrecoverable if lost.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.CREATE.BACKUPS_LIM: Cannot store more than {limit} backups. (You current have {current})
The ID of the backup that you have received in your dms.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.LOAD.ARGUMENTS.PAS: The passphrase you have received on your account creation.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.LOAD.ARGUMENTS.TAR: The channel where to load the content.
The target channel must be a text based channel.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.LOAD.ARGUMENTS.MOD: How should the channel metadata stored be treated
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.EXPORTS.EXPORT.DES: Export a backup into a file that can be imported later on.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.DELETE.ARGUMENTS.I: The ID of the backup that you have received in your dms.
SLASH_COMMAND.BACKUPS.DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Delete one of your already created backups.
SLASH_COMMAND.ADMIN.DESCRIPTION: A collections of commands to administrative tools
SLASH_COMMAND.ADMIN.SYSTEM.DESCRIPTION: A collections of commands to manage the system (redis, mongo, main process).
SLASH_COMMAND.ADMIN.SYSTEM.SHUTDOWN.DESC: Begins a process that shuts down the entire bot.
SLASH_COMMAND.ADMIN.REDIS.EXPIRE.DESCRIP: Returns when a certain keys expires.
SLASH_COMMAND.ADMIN.REDIS.EXPIRE.ARGUMEN: They key to determine its expiry
SLASH_COMMAND.ADMIN.REDIS.GET.DESCRIPTIO: Returns the value of a certain redis key
The key to determine its value
